text: Jo log Allah aur uske Rasool se ladte hain aur zameen mein is liye tag-o-dou karte phirte hain ke fasaad(mischeif) barpa karein unki saza yeh hai ke qatal kiye jayein , ya suli par chadhaye jayein, ya unke haath aur paaon mukhalif simton se kaat daley jayein, ya woh jila watan(banished from the land) kardiye jayein. Yeh zillat o ruswayi to unke liye duniya mein hai aur aakhirat mein unke liye issey badi saza hai
